221748Z AUG 25 HYDROARC 141/25(GEN). 1. HYDROARC WARNINGS IN FORCE AS OF 221743Z AUG. ALL THE INFORCE WARNINGS ARE LISTED HERE. 140/2025, 122/2025, 119/2025, 103/2025. 283/2024. 163/2023. 198/2022. 2. THE COMPLETE TEXT OF ALL IN-FORCE HYDROARC BROADCAST WARNINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE NGA MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WEBSITE AT: MSI.NGA.MIL/NAVWARNINGS. ALTERNATIVELY, THESE MAY BE REQUESTED BY E-MAIL FROM NGA AT NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL. 3. CANCEL HYDROARC 124/25.

302349Z JUL 25 HYDROARC 119/25(15). AMUNDSEN GULF. CANADA. DNC 28. SHOALS REPORTED IN: A. 71-22.50N 116-57.80W. B. 71-22.61N 117-01.30W.

171751Z JUL 25 HYDROARC 103/25. CANCELLED ELECTRONIC NAVIGATIONAL CHART (ENC) ADVISORY. USERS OF NGA ENC PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED OF POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN PROCESSING CANCELLED CHARTS, INCLUDING REINSTALLATION OF RECENTLY CANCELLED CHARTS ON SOME SYSTEMS WITHOUT OBVIOUS ERROR OR WARNING MESSAGES. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5 AND RAYTHEON ANSCHUTZ SYNAPSIS NX SYSTEMS. THIS ISSUE DOES NOT AFFECT NAVY ECDIS. OTHER SYSTEMS ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. USERS MAY REFERENCE NGAS ENC CATALOG (GLOBAL OR REGIONAL PRODUCT LISTINGS) FOR A LIST OF CANCELLED CHARTS WHICH SHOULD BE UNINSTALLED FROM ECDIS. NGAS GLOBAL ENC CATALOG IS AVAILABLE ON HTTPS://MCDP.NGA.MIL, WITH REGIONAL ENC PRODUCT LISTING SPREADSHEETS CONTAINED WITHIN EACH REGIONS ZIP ON ESYNC, NGAS WEBSITES, AND WORLDCOVER DVD. USERS MAY FILTER PRODUCT LISTINGS FOR EDITION OF CXL AND SORT BY ISSUE DATE TO SEE MOST RECENT CANCELLATIONS. CHARTS CANCELLED WITHIN THE LAST 90 DAYS ARE ACTIVELY DISSEMINATED BY NGA AND MOST LIKELY CANDIDATES FOR INADVERTENT REINSTALLATION. NGA IS CONSULTING WITH THE USER COMMUNITY TO ASSESS POSSIBLE CHANGES TO THE CANCELLED CHART DISSEMINATION PROCESS TO MITIGATE THIS POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR.
